headline: Philip Morris (NYSE:PM): Assessing Valuation as Smoke-Free Products Drive Growth and Margins
summary: Philip Morris International (PM) announced it will redeem all outstanding 4.875% Notes due February 2026 in early December. This move has caught the attention of investors watching the company’s ongoing growth story. See our latest analysis for Philip Morris International. Momentum has steadily built for Philip Morris International this year, fueled by the rapid adoption of its smoke-free products and strong pricing power in its core tobacco business. The company’s 29% year-to-date share...
